text: Idimaa, digau huaidu i golo i tadau baahi e haga hai gee nia helekai di Longo Humalia o tumaalia o God bolo gi daudali nadau haihai huaidu, digaula e bae gi daha a Jesus Christ, dela go tadau Dangada Aamua go tadau Dagi. I mua loo di Beebaa Dabu e haga modongoohia di huaidu dela gu hai mee ginai digaula.
